rows.description: The Barista team brews coffee so that we can enjoy a nice, hot cuppa before VN.
Dreamers, thinkers, creators. We invite you to collaborate and explore your ideas with us at the Creative Brunch. Happening once every quarter.
The Logistics team ensures everything is up and running for a smooth VN.
The Security team creates a safe environment for us to enjoy VN freely.
The Stage Crew supports the VN programme, pulling together the various VN teams and the elements of the service.
The Venture team plans and executes events that bring V together in fun and refreshing ways.
The Video team prepares and project lyrics, verses, slides, other visuals; as well as operates the live camera feed at VN.
The VNX team makes every youth feels at home at VN - from the door, to bringing them to a seat and getting them connected.
The VOM (V Letters) team are carriers of good news, writing priceless reminders of the Lord's goodness via letters to sponsored youths.
The VOM (Outreach) team loves on the local and overseas community through events.
